pages.text: The strongest material you could make so far was Netherite. However, repairing Netherite armor had the disadvantage that it was more expensive than making the armor itself. In addition, the protection decreased with every scratch. All this is less problematic when the armor simply $(italic)cannot$() be damaged.$(br)$(italic)Never wilt, stone blossom.
The Bedrock Helmet comes with $(bold)Projectile Protection V$().
The Bedrock Chestplate comes with $(bold)Protection V$().
The Bedrock Leggings come with $(bold)Blast Protection V$().
The Bedrock Boots come with $(bold)Fire Protection V$().
